item.title: I'm a late adopter
item.description: A philosophical piece where I try to elaborate why I don't take any new tech seriously until I'm proven wrong. There's also some shade thrown at our collective obsession to apply as many technical solutions as possible to what are clearly organizational and social issues in software development.

item.title: Fixing unnamed C struct bridging in CocoaScript
item.description: Let's uncover a subtle issue with Objective-C bridging in CocoaScript (a scripting engine powering Sketch plugins) and discuss a history of scripting environments on macOS since 10.5.

item.title: Working with Embed Segues in Storyboards
item.description: Let's learn how Embed Segues actually work internally and how we're supposed to deal with child view controllers wired up via a segue.

item.title: Writing a DTrace script that follows children of a target process
item.description: Talking about various approaches to making DTrace probes match both the main target process and all of its descendants, including those that outlive their ancestor.

item.title: Running a C++ project on Swift Package Manager
item.description: Migrating a legacy cross-platform C++ project from a dreadful Makefile to Swift Package Manager and its declarative schema.

item.title: I have a blog (again)
item.description: Welcome to my new blog, powered by... GitHub Gists?
